actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, as enacted by the Postal Reorganization Act, to provide a 1-cent postage rate for postal cards and post cards.

summary.text: Establishes a 1-cent postage rate for postal cards and post cards.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, as enacted by the Postal Reorganization Act, to provide a 1-cent postage rate for postal cards and post cards.
